movies.Title: Spider
movies.Actors: Ralph Fiennes, Miranda Richardson, Gabriel Byrne, Lynn Redgrave
movies.Plot: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

movies.Title: Avengers
movies.Writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movies.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 38 wins & 79 nominations.

movies.Title: Sherlock
movies.Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Rupert Graves
movies.Plot: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 89 wins & 173 nominations.

movies.Title: The Antman
movies.Actors: Götz Otto, Yasmina Filali, Lars Rudolph, Elisabeth Volkmann

movies.Title: Batman
movies.Writer: Bob Kane (Batman characters), Sam Hamm (story), Sam Hamm (screenplay), Warren Skaaren (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
movies.Plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.
